name: Digital Monsters: D Project
overview: Suddenly, a part of the digital world is gone! In order to restore the lost digital world, the hero is called by Ofanimon and heads to the digital world. However, the villainous Digimons are waiting for the hero there. Can you defeat the boss Digimon and return the Digital World to its former glory? This time around, Digimon returns to its roots and focuses on raising Digimon. The game begins by creating Digimon eggs. By entering seven digits into the digital ball generator, you can create your own digimon eggs. Digimon born from Digitama can be raised in a variety of fields and fed in special ways to evolve into various types (over 150 different variations).
